DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomise prospective multicenter longterm study evaluate survival rate implant , wear periprosthetic osteolysis highly cross-linked polyethylene without addition Vitamin E ( UHMWPE-XE vs. UHMWPE-X ) Total Hip Arthroplasty .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Minimum age : 18 year Maximum age : 75 year Indication cementless THA Approval study participation treatment accord study protocol Physical mental willingness adhere clinical radiological follow Exclusion : Patient able join follow Increased risk anaesthesia accord `` American Society Anesthesiology '' : ASA IV Tumor disease Alcohol drug dependency Permanent cortisone therapy Clinical relevant infection Pregnancy plan pregnancy Previous intervention like adjustmentosteotomy , treatment fracture THA affect side Acute fracture affect hip joint Patients bone quality , doesn´t allow cementless treatment Requirements clinical relevant deformity ( condition preoperation bone fracture , leg length discrepancy > 30 mm , Offsetreduction > 30 mm ) Small acetabular treatment 28 mm head Treatments without use ceramic head Treatments require neck prolonging component
